pages.text: Additional enchantments are added for a variety of purposes.

pages.title: Dune Walker
pages.text: Applicable to Boots. $(br2)Dune Walker increases movement speed while walking on sand. Obtained by combining boots with sandals in an anvil.

pages.title: Snow Drifter
pages.text: Applicable to Boots. $(br2)Snow Drifter increases movement speed while walking on snow. Obtained by combining boots with snowshoes in an anvil.

pages.title: Speed Skater
pages.text: Applicable to Boots. $(br2)Speed Skater increases movement speed while walking on ice. Obtained by combining boots with snowshoes in an anvil.

pages.title: Gas Protection
pages.text: Applicable to Helmets. $(br2)Gas Protection prevents harmful effects and suffocation while in a gas block. Obtained by combining a helmet with a $(l:tools/gas_mask)Gas Mask$() in an anvil.

pages.title: Swing
pages.text: Swing increases attack speed of single click tools. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() $(li)$(l:tools/crowbars)Crowbars$() $(br)Levels: I-V

pages.title: Daze
pages.text: Daze inflicts slowness on a struck mob. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() $(br)Levels: I-III

pages.title: Puncture
pages.text: Puncture allows throwable tools to pierce armour. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/spears)Spears$() $(br)Levels: I-III

pages.title: Atomize
pages.text: Atomize increases the chance of receiving drops from crushing. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() $(br)Levels: I

pages.title: Lightning Aspect
pages.text: Lightning Aspect summons lightning on a struct mob. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() $(br)Levels: I

pages.title: Excavate
pages.text: Excavate allows hammers to crush multiple blocks at once. Level 1 does a cross shape and level 2 does 3x3, both centered on the block mined. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() $(br)Levels: I-II

pages.title: Impact
pages.text: Impact increases the knockback of thrown spears. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/spears)Spears$() $(br)Levels: I-V

pages.title: Quake
pages.text: Quake increases mining speed of a tool based off y-level. The lower in the world you are, the faster it mines. Each level increases the maximum speed that can be reached. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/pickaxes)Pickaxes$() $(li)$(l:tools/shovels)Shovels$() $(br)Levels: I-III

pages.title: Foraging
pages.text: Foraging allows any level of hoe to be able to $(l:mechanics/foraging)Forage$(). The enchantment also expands the drops obtainable to include saltpeter, other food items and mob drops. Some drops are biome dependent. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hoes)Hoes() $(br)Levels: I

pages.title: Prying
pages.text: Prying has a chance of causing the target to drop their currently held item. Chance is determined by the rarity of the item held. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/crowbars)Crowbars$() $(br)Levels: I-III

pages.title: Antiquated
pages.text: Antiquated increases the luck stat when held in the main hand or off hand. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)Pewter Tools$() $(br)Levels: I-III

pages.title: Cleanse
pages.text: Cleanse deals extra damage based on the number of effects the target has. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)Stainless Steel Sword() $(br)Levels: I-II

pages.title: Endpoint
pages.text: Endpoint teleports you to the end destination of your spear. Deals less damage as the level of the enchantment increases. $(br2)Only obtainable from the Endite element. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/spears)Spears$() $(br)Levels: I-III

pages.title: Ghastly Regeneration
pages.text: Ghastly Regeneration causes tools to repair themselves while the owner is under the effect of Regeneration. $(br2)Only obtainable from the Ghastium element. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)Any tool$() $(br)Levels: I

pages.title: Curse of Withering
pages.text: Curse of Withering causes any damage to be taken (except Magic and Wither) to inflict the Wither effect on the owner. $(br2)Only obtainable from the Wither element. $(br2)Applicable to: $(li)Any tool$() $(br)Levels: I
